function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access to parks leading to mental health issues, physical inactivity, and domestic violence consequences","Impact":"Decreased mental well-being, physical health problems, and increased domestic violence","Mitigation":"Implement safe access to parks, provide alternative recreational activities, and support mental health services","Technologies":"Park capacity monitoring tools, virtual fitness programs, and telehealth services","People":"Citizens, especially those who rely on parks for recreation","Owner":"Park managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Crowding in less ventilated and denser spaces due to park closures","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and spread in crowded and poorly ventilated areas","Mitigation":"Implement safe access to parks with capacity limits and ventilation, and educate the public on safe outdoor activities","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, park capacity tracking apps, and public health awareness campaigns","People":"General public, especially those who frequent crowded spaces","Owner":"Park managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Closure of small gyms leading to reliance on crowded parks for exercise","Impact":"Increased crowding in parks, higher risk of virus transmission, and potential safety concerns in crowded outdoor spaces","Mitigation":"Support small gyms, promote outdoor fitness initiatives, and enforce safe physical distancing measures in parks","Technologies":"Online fitness platforms, outdoor fitness equipment, and crowd monitoring systems","People":"Frequent park visitors, especially those who previously used small gyms","Owner":"Local fitness businesses, park managers"}]}
